com.quantcomponents.core.model.beans
Class ContractBase

java.lang.Object
  com.quantcomponents.core.model.beans.ContractBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
IContract
Direct Known Subclasses:
ContractBean
public abstract class ContractBase
extends Object
implements IContract

Abstract class to be used as base for every implementation of IContract This class defines important methods than ensure that a contract definition can be used as key and it can be consistently represented within the framework

shortStringRepr

public static String shortStringRepr(IContract contract)
Static helper method to create a unique, readable representation. The mandatory properties entering this representation are:
  • symbol
  • security type
  • currency code
The optional properties are used only if not null:
  • option right
  • expiration date
  • strike
  • primary exchange
Since this representation strive to use all and only the properties that identify the contract, this is used for equality tests.

Parameters:
contract - an IContract
Returns:
a readable representation of the input parameter
